languages.text: "В этом проклятом мирке не было ничего, достойного внимания. Кроме тассерция. Когда мне стали сниться сны о нем и о смене тела, я подумал, что схожу с ума... И поделился этим с моим скульптором, Тавриском ныне покойным. Он помог мне проникнуть в суть минерала. Дальше следовали эксперименты и изыскания формы: их проводил в основном Тавриск. Я лишен его дара, а ведь как бы я мог развернуться, будучи колдуном..."

traits.locale_text: "В этом проклятом мирке не было ничего, достойного внимания. Кроме тассерция. Когда мне стали сниться сны о нем и о смене тела, я подумал, что схожу с ума... От скуки и безвыходности я — то есть мы, с моим скульптором Тавриском, ныне покойным, — начали изучать минерал. Изучал, в основном, он. Я лишен его дара, а ведь как бы я мог развернуться, будучи колдуном... "
traits.speaker: FW_TrueGovernor

languages.text: "This wretched little world held nothing worthy of attention... save for thassertium. When I started having dreams about it, and about changing bodies, I thought I was going insane... And I shared this with my sculptor, the now late Tavrisk. He helped me to understand the essence of the mineral. Experiments and studies followed — mostly carried out by Tavrisk. I don't have his gift, but oh, the things I could do if I were a sorcerer..."
languages.original_text: "В этом проклятом мирке не было ничего, достойного внимания. Кроме тассерция. Когда мне стали сниться сны о нем и о смене тела, я подумал, что схожу с ума... И поделился этим с моим скульптором, Тавриском ныне покойным. Он помог мне проникнуть в суть минерала. Дальше следовали эксперименты и изыскания формы: их проводил в основном Тавриск. Я лишен его дара, а ведь как бы я мог развернуться, будучи колдуном..."

traits.locale_text: "This wretched little world held nothing worthy of attention... save for thassertium. When I started having dreams about it, and about changing bodies, I thought I was going insane... And I shared this with my sculptor, the now late Tavrisk. He helped me to understand the essence of the mineral. Experiments and studies followed — mostly carried out by Tavrisk. I don't have his gift, but oh, the things I could do if I were a sorcerer..."

"This cursed little world held nothing worthy of attention. Save for thassertium. When I started having dreams of it and of body swapping, I thought I was going insane... Out of sheer boredom and hopelessness, we — that is, myself and my sculptor, the now-definitively-late Tavrisk — began to study the mineral. He did most of the studying. I don't have his gift, but oh, the things I could do if I were a sorcerer... "

languages.text: “这个破破烂烂的小世界几乎没有任何值得关注的东西……除了塔瑟拉水晶。当我开始梦到它，梦到与别人互换身体时，我还以为我已经疯了……我把这些事情告诉了我的雕刻师，也就是也就是死了的塔夫瑞克，而他协助我了解到这种矿物的本质。我们开始研究这种矿物的特性。绝大部分的研究都是他完成的，我缺乏他那样的天赋。不过，噢，想想看！如果我是巫师，那我能做的事情可就太多了……”
languages.original_text: "This wretched little world held nothing worthy of attention... save for thassertium. When I started having dreams about it, and about changing bodies, I thought I was going insane... And I shared this with my sculptor, the now late Tavrisk. He helped me to understand the essence of the mineral. Experiments and studies followed — mostly carried out by Tavrisk. I don't have his gift, but oh, the things I could do if I were a sorcerer..."

traits.locale_text: “这个破破烂烂的小世界几乎没有任何值得关注的东西……除了塔瑟拉水晶。当我开始梦到它，梦到与别人互换身体时，我还以为我已经疯了……我把这些事情告诉了我的雕刻师，也就是也就是死了的塔夫瑞克，而他协助我了解到这种矿物的本质。我们开始研究这种矿物的特性。绝大部分的研究都是他完成的，我缺乏他那样的天赋。不过，噢，想想看！如果我是巫师，那我能做的事情可就太多了……”

languages.text: 「この哀れな小さな惑星には注目に値するものは何もない…タッセリウムを除いては。私がそれを、体を交換することを夢見始めたころ、自分が狂っていくのかと思った…そしてこのことを、彫刻家であり、今は故人となったタヴリスクに打ち明けた。彼はその鉱物の本質を理解する手助けをしてくれた。主にタヴリスクによる実験と研究が続いた。私には彼のような才能はなかった。あぁ、私がソーサラーだったら、できることがあっただろうに…」
languages.original_text: "This wretched little world held nothing worthy of attention... save for thassertium. When I started having dreams about it, and about changing bodies, I thought I was going insane... And I shared this with my sculptor, the now late Tavrisk. He helped me to understand the essence of the mineral. Experiments and studies followed — mostly carried out by Tavrisk. I don't have his gift, but oh, the things I could do if I were a sorcerer..."

traits.locale_text: 「この哀れな小さな惑星には注目に値するものは何もない…タッセリウムを除いては。私がそれを、体を交換することを夢見始めたころ、自分が狂っていくのかと思った…そしてこのことを、彫刻家であり、今は故人となったタヴリスクに打ち明けた。彼はその鉱物の本質を理解する手助けをしてくれた。主にタヴリスクによる実験と研究が続いた。私には彼のような才能はなかった。あぁ、私がソーサラーだったら、できることがあっただろうに…」

languages.text: «Este mundo miserable no albergaba nada digno de mi atención... salvo el thassertio. Cuando empecé a soñar con él, y con cambiar de cuerpo, creí que me estaba volviendo loco... y compartí esta inquietud con mi escultor, el difunto Tavrisk. Él me ayudó a comprender la esencia del mineral. Luego vinieron los experimentos y los análisis, realizados en su mayor parte por el propio Tavrisk. Yo carezco de su don, pero ¡ah, la de cosas que podría hacer si dominase la hechicería...!».
languages.original_text: "This wretched little world held nothing worthy of attention... save for thassertium. When I started having dreams about it, and about changing bodies, I thought I was going insane... And I shared this with my sculptor, the now late Tavrisk. He helped me to understand the essence of the mineral. Experiments and studies followed — mostly carried out by Tavrisk. I don't have his gift, but oh, the things I could do if I were a sorcerer..."

Yo carezco de su don, pero ¡ah, la de cosas que podría hacer si dominase la hechicería...!».

languages.text: "Bu sefil küçük dünya, dikkat çekmeye değer hiçbir şeye sahip değildi... Tasertiyum hariç. Onunla ve beden değiştirmeyle ilgili rüyalar görmeye başladığımda delirdiğimi sanmıştım... Bu durumu şu anda rahmetli olan heykeltıraşım Tavrisk ile paylaştım. Madenin özünü anlamama yardımcı oldu. Sonrasında deneyler ve araştırmalar başladı, bunlardan çoğunlukla Tavrisk sorumluydu. Bende onun yeteneği yok. Sahir olsam neler neler yapardım..."
languages.original_text: "This wretched little world held nothing worthy of attention... save for thassertium. When I started having dreams about it, and about changing bodies, I thought I was going insane... And I shared this with my sculptor, the now late Tavrisk. He helped me to understand the essence of the mineral. Experiments and studies followed — mostly carried out by Tavrisk. I don't have his gift, but oh, the things I could do if I were a sorcerer..."

Onunla ve beden değiştirmeyle ilgili rüyalar görmeye başladığımda delirdiğimi sanmıştım... Bu durumu şu anda rahmetli olan heykeltıraşım Tavrisk ile paylaştım. Madenin özünü anlamama yardımcı oldu. Sonrasında deneyler ve araştırmalar başladı, bunlardan çoğunlukla Tavrisk sorumluydu. Bende onun yeteneği yok. Sahir olsam neler neler yapardım..."

languages.text: « Ce misérable petit monde n'avait rien qui puisse retenir l'attention... à l'exception du thassertium. Quand j'ai commencé à rêver de ce minerai et de changement de corps, j'ai bien cru que je devenais fou... Et j'en ai parlé à mon sculpteur, le défunt Tavrisk. Il m'a aidé à comprendre l'essence de ce matériau. S'en sont suivies des expériences, des analyses... pour la plupart, entreprises par Tavrisk. J'aurais pu accomplir tant de choses si j'avais été sorcier, mais je n'ai hélas pas son don... »
languages.original_text: "This wretched little world held nothing worthy of attention... save for thassertium. When I started having dreams about it, and about changing bodies, I thought I was going insane... And I shared this with my sculptor, the now late Tavrisk. languages.text: "Diese mickrige kleine Welt enthielt nichts, was Aufmerksamkeit wert wäre ... außer Thassertium. Als ich begann, davon und vom Körpertausch zu träumen, dachte ich, ich würde wahnsinnig ... Und ich habe das mit meinem Skulpteur geteilt, dem mittlerweile verstorbenen Tavrisk. Er hat mir geholfen, die Essenz des Minerals zu verstehen. Es folgten Experimente und Studien – größtenteils durchgeführt von Tavrisk. Mir fehlt dieses Talent, aber oh, was ich alles vollbringen könnte, wenn ich ein Hexer wäre ..."
languages.original_text: "This wretched little world held nothing worthy of attention... save for thassertium.
